Container.Name: Luma
Container.Overview: Luma is a modern, fully self-hosted personal library management system with built-in e-reader and audiobook player. Supports EPUB, PDF, MOBI, CBZ, CBR for books and M4B, MP3, M4A for audiobooks. Features include progress tracking, collections, bookmarks, highlights, annotations, automatic metadata extraction, multi-user authentication, and a beautiful interface. Uses local SQLite database - no external database required.

Config.Name: WebUI Port
Config.Description: Web interface port - change this to use a different port

Config.Name: Config Directory
Config.Description: Directory for SQLite database and application settings (persists across updates)

Config.Name: Books Directory
Config.Description: Directory for storing e-books (EPUB, PDF, MOBI, CBZ, CBR)

Config.Name: Audiobooks Directory
Config.Description: Directory for storing audiobooks (M4B, MP3, M4A)

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Secret key for session encryption - Generate with: openssl rand -base64 32

Config.Name: Application Port
Config.Description: Internal application port (should match WebUI Port)

Config.Name: Google Books API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Google Books API key for book recommendations

Config.Name: SendGrid API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) SendGrid API key for Send to Kindle/Email feature

Config.Name: Resend API Key
Config.Description: (Optional) Resend API key for Send to Kindle/Email feature (alternative to SendGrid)
